mention.text: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas called the Nazi Holocaust
the most heinous crime to have occurred against humanity in the modern era
the most heinous crime to have occurred against humanity in the modern era , coming from Abbas
the 6 million Jews killed in the Holocaust
the reconciliation agreement between Hamas and Abbas 's
a guarded welcome to Abbas 's statement on Sunday
